name: tipsiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being slightly drunk: Reaching home in a somewhat inebriated state, he wanted to sleep off his tipsiness. He was in his usual state of tipsiness. See
tipsy
More examplesFewer examplesIce and mild tipsiness is a bad combination.Blood alcohol concentration is a universally accepted measure of tipsiness.He moved with the peculiar deliberateness of one who is controlling his own tipsiness.
